entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:51 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 4:48 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.0°C
Pressure: 101.4 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -4.4°C
Wind: SSE 35 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 50 gusting to 80 near midnight then northwest 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:50 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:50 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 4:50 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
